snippet: Thousands of painstakingly-bred rodents used in the study of heart disease, cancer and mental disorders drowned at a New York University research center in Kips Bay.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of painstakingly-bred rodents used in the study of heart disease, cancer and mental disorders drowned at a New York University research center in Kips Bay.

headline.seo: Genetically Altered Lab Rats at N.Y.U. Die in Flooding
headline.main: Hurricane Sandy’s Lesser-Known Victims: Lab Rats
headline.print_headline: Hurricane Sandy’s Lesser-Known Victims: Lab Rats
